name: crypto
description: Cross-platform crypto library with support of : Aes, BCrypt, BlowFish, Des, TripleDes, TwoFish, Hmac, Pbkdf2, Ripemd160, Sha224, Sha256, Sha384, Sha512, Salsa20, XSalsa, ChaCha, SCrypt, RC4, ChaCha20-Poly1305, XChaCha20-Poly1305, XSalsa20-Poly1305, Blake2b, Blake2s, Blake3, Argon2d, Argon2i, Argon2id, AesCtrDrbg, SecureRandom. Block cipher mode of operation:  cbc, cfb, ctr, ecb, ofb, pcbc, cmac, ccm, gcm, siv, gcm-siv, eax, kw, kwp, xts, ff1
releasenote: Add incremental hashing for Sha224,Sha256,Sha384 and Sha512. SecureRandom fixes.
